item.title: 中国液化天然气需求看来又要失望一年了
item.description: 由于令人失望的工业需求和持续走高的全球价格，中国的液化天然气进口有可能在今年再次陷入疲软。【原文：Chinese liquefied natural gas imports are at risk of another weak year as disappointing industrial demand and persistently high global prices look set to reduce purchases.】

item.title: 澳大利亚资本支出因数据中心和飞机而创下 2021 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 澳大利亚的商业投资出现了自 2021 年初以来的最大增幅，这主要得益于数据中心和飞机方面的大笔支出。【原文：Australian business investment posted its biggest increase since early 2021, driven by major outlays on data centers and aircraft — a welcome boost for an economy that has been struggling to generate momentum.】

item.title: 日本避谈特朗普是否要求不要挑衅中国
item.description: 有报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普曾建议日本首相佐那江隆一不要在台湾问题上挑衅中国，日本政府最高发言人对此避而不谈。【原文：Japan’s top government spokesperson refrained from directly addressing whether US President Donald Trump advised Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi not to provoke China over Taiwan, following a report suggesting such an exchange took place.】

item.title: 澳大利亚可能考虑提前加息，因为经济已接近速度极限
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank Ltd.）首席经济学家莎莉-奥尔德（Sally Auld）表示，如果经济增长加快、劳动力市场收紧，澳大利亚央行最早可能需要在 2026 年上半年加息。【原文：Australia’s central bank may need to raise interest rates as early as the first half of 2026 if economic growth quickens and the labor market tightens, according to Sally Auld, chief economist at National Australia Bank Ltd.】

item.title: 印度成为世界上最平静的股市之一
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长霍克斯比称进一步降息的门槛很高
item.description: 新西兰央行行长克里斯蒂安-霍克斯比（Christian Hawkesby）表示，目前进一步降息的门槛很高，这强化了宽松周期可能已经结束的信号。【原文：New Zealand central bank governor Christian Hawkesby said there is now a high hurdle for further interest-rate cuts, reinforcing the signal that the easing cycle has likely come to an end.】

item.title: 增长困境加剧，中国工业利润再度下滑
item.description: 中国工业企业的盈利三个月来首次出现下降，进一步证明这个世界第二大经济体正在失去动力。【原文：China’s industrial enterprises saw their earnings drop for the first time in three months, adding to evidence that the world’s second-largest economy is losing steam.】

item.title: 新西兰企业乐观情绪创 11 年新高，显示经济复苏迹象
item.description: 澳新银行（ANZ Bank）的一项调查显示，11月份新西兰企业对贸易前景的乐观情绪飙升至11年来的最高点，这进一步表明经济正在复苏。【原文：Optimism among New Zealand firms about their trading prospects surged to an 11-year high in November, an ANZ Bank survey showed, adding to signs that an economic recovery is under way.】

item.title: DeepSeek 竞争对手的中国支持者巨石公司融资 2.89 亿美元
item.description: 支持 DeepSeek 竞争对手 MoonShot AI 的巨石管理公司（Monolith Management）已经筹集了约 2.89 亿美元，它正寻求在该国的人工智能领域投资更多公司。【原文：Monolith Management, which backed DeepSeek-rival MoonShot AI, has raised about $289 million as it seeks to invest in more companies in the country’s artificial intelligence space.】

item.title: 金融风险持续，增长保持强劲，韩国央行维持利率不变
item.description: 韩国央行维持基准利率不变，此举受到广泛期待，因为强劲的经济增长使当局有余地继续关注确保房地产市场的反弹不会引发金融动荡。【原文：South Korea’s central bank left its benchmark rate unchanged in a widely-expected move, as robust economic growth gives authorities room to keep their focus on ensuring that a housing-market rally doesn’t trigger financial instability.】

item.title: 日元反弹可能是亚洲新兴市场落后者韩元反弹的关键
item.description: 日元持续升值可能对韩元有利，韩元是本季度亚洲新兴货币中表现最差的货币，近二十年来，韩元和日元的走势最为接近。【原文：A sustained yen appreciation is likely to bode well for the South Korean won, emerging Asia’s worst-performing currency this quarter, with moves between the two most closely in sync in nearly two decades.】

item.title: 印度 Motilal 计划成立高达 3.36 亿美元的私人信贷基金
item.description: 印度 Motilal Oswal Alternate Investment Advisors Pvt Ltd. 已向印度证券交易委员会提出申请，为其首家私人信贷基金募集多达 300 亿卢比（3.36 亿美元）的资金。【原文：India’s Motilal Oswal Alternate Investment Advisors Pvt Ltd. has applied to the Securities and Exchange Board of India to raise as much as 30 billion rupees ($336 million) for its maiden private credit fund.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国降息前景，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 由于市场对美国再次降息的预期不断升温，黄金价格在上一交易日上涨近 1%，但随后趋于稳定。【原文：Gold steadied, having gained nearly 1% in the previous session on growing expectations of another interest-rate cut in the US.】

item.title: 交易商关注乌克兰谈判和欧佩克+，石油走低
item.description: 投资者追踪美国领导的结束乌克兰战争的努力，同时展望本周末的欧佩克+会议，石油走低。【原文：Oil edged lower as investors tracked US-led efforts to end the war in Ukraine, while looking ahead to an OPEC+ gathering this weekend.】

item.title: 法瑞尔支持的东京街头服饰品牌上市后寻求海外发展
item.description:
随着 Human Made 的上市获得超额认购，DJ 出身的设计师 Nigo 正在将日本的街头文化转化为可投资资产。【原文：

With Human Made’s heavily oversubscribed listing, DJ-turned-designer Nigo is transforming Japan’s street culture into an investable asset.

】

item.title: 降息反弹延续，亚洲股市看高一线：市场综述
item.description: 周四亚洲股市将高开，此前美国股市在感恩节休市前连续第四次上涨，受降息预期增强的提振。【原文：Asian equities were set to open higher Thursday after US stocks notched a fourth straight gain ahead of the Thanksgiving break, lifted by growing expectations for interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 象牙海岸认为石油和天然气将在未来五年刺激经济增长
item.description: 象牙海岸规划与发展部长卡巴-尼亚莱（Kaba Niale）表示，随着石油和天然气开采活动的增加，未来五年象牙海岸的经济增长有望加速。【原文：Ivory Coast’s economic growth is poised to accelerate in the next five years as the country sees an increase in oil and gas activity, Planning and Development Minister Kaba Niale said.】

item.title: 中国为儿童提供难得的休息时间，促使父母增加支出
item.description: 到今年为止，中国只有少数几个城市允许学校在每年秋季放假。但最近几个月，至少有 27 个城市加入了这一行列，而且可能还会有更多城市加入。【原文：Until this year, only a handful of cities in China allowed schools to go on a break each fall. But in recent months, at least 27 others have joined the list, with more possibly on the way.】

item.title: 澳大利亚收紧银行高风险抵押贷款规则
item.description: 澳大利亚银行业监管机构收紧了对银行抵押贷款的规定，以求先发制人地遏制高杠杆借款人带来的可能导致房地产市场脆弱的新风险。【原文：Australia’s banking regulator tightened rules on bank lending for mortgages as it seeks to preemptively contain emerging risks from highly leveraged borrowers that could cause vulnerabilities in the housing market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告甲骨文信用保护接近历史最高点
item.description: 据摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，甲骨文公司的债务风险指数在11月份达到了三年来的最高点，到2026年，情况只会变得更糟，除非这家数据库巨头能够缓解投资者对大规模人工智能支出的焦虑。【原文：A gauge of risk on Oracle Corp.’s debt reached a three-year high in November, and things are only going to get worse in 2026 unless the database giant is able to assuage investor anxiety about a massive artificial intelligence spending spree, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 摩根大通预测美联储将于 12 月降息
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Economists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. see the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates next month, a reversal of the bank’s briefly held view that policymakers would delay reducing borrowing costs until January.】

item.title: 实验室内部：教机器人煮咖啡、叠衣服
item.description: 一家成立一年的初创公司正在开发人工智能软件，教机器人如何完成日常任务。但首先...【原文：A year-old startup is finding traction building AI software to teach robots how to tackle everyday tasks. But first…】

item.title: 现代重工称，人工智能为实现特朗普造船目标开辟了更快的道路
item.description: 韩国企业集团 HD Hyundai 看到了通过部署人工智能加速美国造船业复兴的机会。【原文：South Korean conglomerate HD Hyundai sees an opportunity to accelerate America’s shipbuilding revival by deploying artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 黑帮以星巴克和雀巢青睐的哥伦比亚咖啡产区为目标
item.description: 随着安第斯山脉大片地区的治安恶化，生产哥伦比亚最高品质咖啡的农场正成为武装抢劫犯和敲诈勒索者的目标。【原文：Farms that produce some of Colombia’s highest-quality coffee are being targeted by armed robbers and extortionists as security deteriorates across swathes of the Andes.】

item.title: 从戴尔到惠普，科技公司都警告内存芯片将受到人工智能的挤压
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.）、惠普公司（HP Inc.【原文：Dell Technologies Inc., HP Inc. and other tech companies are warning of potential memory-chip supply shortages in the coming year due to soaring demand from the buildout of artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 乌克兰在面临资金风险的情况下与国际货币基金组织达成 82 亿美元协议
item.description: 国际货币基金组织宣布与乌克兰就一项新的融资计划达成协议，向这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的国际盟友发出了一个积极的信号。【原文：The International Monetary Fund has announced an agreement with Ukraine on a new financing program, sending a positive signal to the war-torn nation’s international allies.】

item.title: 里夫斯的预算赢得了胜利，但也为未来埋下了隐患
item.description: 财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在预算中做了足够多的工作来帮助她和首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）生存下去，重新建立了重要的财政缓冲区并扩大了福利。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves did enough in her budget to help her and Prime Minister Keir Starmer survive, building back a vital fiscal buffer and expanding welfare.】

item.title: 高盛为泽西城住宅大厦融资 2 亿美元
item.description: 高盛集团正在为新泽西州泽西城一个拥有 360 个单元的住宅项目安排超过 2 亿美元的建设融资，为这个纽约市的邻近地区增加了市场价住房和经济适用房的组合。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is arranging more than $200 million of construction financing for a 360-unit residential project in Jersey City, New Jersey, adding a mix of market-rate and affordable housing to the New York City neighbor.】

item.title: 美联储《米色报告》显示消费者 K 型分裂加深
item.description: 美联储表示，最近几周美国经济活动变化不大，但除高端购物者外，总体消费支出进一步下降。【原文：US economic activity was little changed in recent weeks, though overall consumer spending declined further except among higher-end shoppers, the Federal Reserve said.】

item.title: Amundi 对资产所有者重新分配委托 "信心十足
item.description: Amundi SA 表示，由于管理气候风险的愿望日益强烈，机构任务也在不断调整，因此预计将有更多资金流入。【原文：Amundi SA says it’s expecting to see more inflows as a result of what it describes as ongoing adjustments in institutional mandates triggered by a growing desire to manage climate risk.】
